metadata.name: Slice Genesis NFT üç∞
metadata.description:
Welcome to the slicer of the Slice Genesis NFT collection, made to celebrate the launch of Slice protocol üç∞

Products in d-stores can be used in [many ways](https://slice.so/#sold), from selling tickets / merch to distribute NFTs among allowlisted users.

Here eligible users can claim Slice Genesis NFTs by interacting with the product store below, with a different mechanism depending on the product:

1. **Allowlist**: Only allowlisted users can claim;
2. **Token-gating**: Only users who possess at least 25k SLX tokens can claim.

**Claim the NFTs by getting the products below!** üçï

---

Holders may receive benefits and early access to new Slice features ü•ß

See the collection on [OpenSea](https://opensea.io/collection/slice-genesis), [LooksRare](https://looksrare.org/collections/0x4AA8C47fE6bfD03F3D219802233E6728FB6BdC86) or [Etherscan](https://etherscan.io/token/0x4aa8c47fe6bfd03f3d219802233e6728fb6bdc86)
